name: @decorators/socket
description: node decorators - decorators for socket.io library
author: Serhii Sol

scripts.clean-tsc: find . -name "*.js" -type f -not -path "./node_modules/*" -delete && find . -name "*.js.map" -type f -not -path "./node_modules/*" -delete && find . -name "*.d.ts" -type f -not -path "./node_modules/*" -not -path "./types/*" -delete
